    • Uses of Player in shared.model

      Methods in shared.model that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player[] Game.getAllPlayers()
      This is only inteded for extracting information from the players.
      Player Game.getCurrentPlayer()
      This method may be beneficial in the event of some other aspect of the game asking which player's turn it is.
      Player Game.getLargestArmy() 
      Player Game.getLongestRoad() 
      Player Game.getPlayerByID(int playerID)
      Retrieves the Player Object for the given playerID
      Player[] Game.moveRobberToHex(int UserId, HexLocation hexLocation)
      Moves the robber to the specified HexLocation, and retrieves the players that own municipals next to that hex, excluding those that don't have resources to steal and the player that moved the robber

    • Uses of Player in shared.model.board

      Methods in shared.model.board with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Board.canDoPlaceCityOnVertex(Player player, VertexLocation vertexLocation)
      Determine whether a specified player's city can be placed on a specified vertex This call should be happening after the player has already verified ability to purchase a city
      boolean Board.canDoPlaceInitialRoadOnEdge(Player player, EdgeLocation edgeLocation)
      Determines whether a specified player's INITIAL road can be placed on a specified edge This call should be happening after the player has already verified ability to purchase a road
      boolean Board.canDoPlaceRoadOnEdge(Player player, EdgeLocation edgeLocation)
      Determines whether a specified player's road can be placed on a specified edge This call should be happening after the player has already verified ability to purchase a road
      boolean Board.canDoPlaceSettlementOnVertex(Player player, VertexLocation vertexLocation)
      Determine whether a specified player's settlement can be placed on a specified vertexLocation This call should be happening after the player has already verified ability to purchase a settlement
      void Board.placeCityOnVertex(Player player, VertexLocation vertexLocation)
      Places a city on a specified vertex
      void Board.placeInitialRoadOnEdge(Player player, EdgeLocation edgeLocation)
      Places an INITIAL road on a specified edge
